plot: Edward walks casually down an abandon downtown street when he discovers a woman lieing dead on the side walk. When he runs to check the body, he notices a little girl in the alleyway ...
title: Mazer World
plot_es: Edward walks casually down an abandon downtown street when he discovers a woman lieing dead on the side walk. When he runs to check the body, he notices a little girl in the alleyway ...
